name: Truck Space Parking 3D
description:
Truck Space Parking 3D is a truck driving simulator, in which you must collect heavy goods and deliver them in a heavy truck. This truck game is not like any other truck parking game, this game start with starting your engine in space, putting the truck into drive, and then makes your way to the given place, collect your goods, and then carefully drive your truck down the road, turning left and right. Using the guidance of the arrows marked on the space road, to the heavy truck parking spot. This truck parking game is not only about delivering the items but also parking it.
In this Truck Space Parking 3D game you will get best truck model available to us and you will drive in nice realistic physics control to make results more feasible and clear and provided you with different truck in each environment as per requirement of the season in the scene. You will enjoy the experience of big wheel truck parking in this truck parking simulator.
